author: kkolinko
msg: Log debug and error messages immediately and add stacktraces to them.

author: kkolinko
msg: Java 6 does not like when the code throws a Throwable but it is not declared as thrown by the method. Java 7 is fine though.

author: ivan
msg: Use journal_mode = TRUNCATE for sqlite [1] instead of default DELETE value.
It makes svn checkout about 10% faster on Windows at expense of one empty
file in .svn. Create/delete file is relatively expensive operation on
Windows, especially if indexes/virus scanners are enabled.
The TRUNCATE and DELETE journal modes are compatible, so different
Subversion clients with different journal mode should just work with same
(svn_sqlite__open): Execute PRAGMA journal_mode = TRUNCATE when opening

author: kkolinko
msg: Add branch attribute for <git> element to DTD

author: markt
msg: Dump the full access log if the wrong number of entries appear in the log
